titles.title: A bill to rescind certain amounts of budget authority and to repeal certain provisions of law contained in an Act making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 4/13/1988--Introduced. Rescinds FY 1988 budget authority for certain programs listed in the message from the President to the Congress on March 14, 1988. Repeals or amends (as specified) certain continuing appropriations for FY 1988 as listed in such message.
